title: Reimburse DAO expenses
body:
Proposed by [@monet-supply](https://twitter.com/MonetSupply)

### Background

The setup and operations of the PastaDAO multisig and discord has incurred the following expenses:
- @monet-supply:
  - 1.024989141 ETH: Purchasing [pasta.eth domain](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x960090d78302a7cb3df40d9277cb264ec21a438e024d7ce0c3b6fe23e08f591f)
  - 0.028450241 ETH: [Domain renewal](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xc65a65a6370d999cccbc019c1b491abec3da7d6c5e7dc252c135e203125ba69d)
  - $100 USD: Purchasing discord boost to L1 for a year
  - 0.035941185 ETH: [Deploying multisig](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x7bc919eba28deaea2163eb07d843f7bb197696f2cc9094d9cb471c050e2a97f7)
  - 0.011467478 ETH: [Adding Mubaris to multisig](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x540039795f8f704d7ae98c8b021a04cfbd0f5ac3e96e12896482ee1599183afc)
  - 0.016581075 ETH: [Adding Andy to multisig](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x75b65caa084f69a9298a8210bf906a5ace55f5d1e8d4fa0f14a9a9f4c1ba0556)
- @mubaris:
  - 0.01141361 ETH: Executing multisig [test transaction](https://etherscan.io/tx/0x022901fc860b3166a2569f33a8b3b0ef5faa59a07cbb4fb8753f043f2da6dfef)

### Proposal

I propose reimbursement for the above mentioned expenses for @monet-supply and @mubaris. 

Based on the past week's price ranges, I propose reimbursement with PASTA from the treasury at the following nominal exchange rates:
- $0.25 per PASTA
- $1800 per ETH

This equates to:
- 7200 PASTA per 1 ETH
- 4 PASTA per $1

These exchange rates yield the following final reimbursement amounts:
- @monet-supply
  - 1.11742912 ETH * 7200 PASTA/ETH = 8045 PASTA
  - $100 * 4 PASTA/$ = 400 PASTA
  - Total: 8445 PASTA
- @mubaris
  - 0.01141361 ETH * 7200 PASTA/ETH = 83 PASTA
  - Total: 83 PASTA

Grant total: 8528 PASTA

### Next Steps

If this proposal is approved by voters, the PastaDAO multisig will be authorized to transfer the amounts shown above to reimburse DAO expenses. 

@monet-supply is also planning to submit a vote to approve funding for development work undertaken so far on the PastaDAO governance contracts and liquidity incentive mechanism. This will be presented in a future proposal.

### Proposal Question

Do you approve transferring 8045 PASTA to @monet-supply ([monetsupply.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x8d07d225a769b7af3a923481e1fdf49180e6a265)) and 83 PASTA to @mubaris ([mubaris.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x8ecce8e28af4a2b8d3b093ef34b24525af0989c6)) as reimbursement for DAO related expenses?
author: 0x8d07D225a769b7Af3A923481E1FdF49180e6A265
